meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Kathy Johnson Damian Henri Fidelito Cortes Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6678.

td.p: Kathy Johnson, a restaurant manager from Minnetonka, Minnesota
Damian Henri, an architect from Shaker Heights, Ohio
Fidelito Cortes, a writer from Port Jefferson Station, New York (whose 2-day cash winnings total $45,000)

tr.td: RED-DY
AIM!
FIRE!
TECH IQ
BUDDHISM
IT ENDS WITH "US"

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'The parting of the Red Sea is described in chapter 14 of this Bible book')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: The parting of the Red Sea is described in chapter 14 of this Bible book

tr.td: Fidelito
Damian
Kathy
ROBOTS
FRENCH DRESSING
LITERARY SELF-PORTRAITS
ON THE WESTERNMOST BORDER OF...
PICK UP THE PACE
(Sandra: I'm Justice Sandra Day O'Connor, with some clues about the history of the Supreme Court and the role I was privileged to play in it.)
